A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Subscribed to RT only to leave this review. By far the worse Star Wars movie ever. Long\, boring and disrespectful\, both towards the original trilogy and the previous movie.
The high votes of the tomatometer shows how the critics are heavily influenced by the fact that it is a Disney movie\, no way so many people could not see all the enormous flaws this movie has.

The wors part of all is that the director of this movie will be the one that does the new trilogy... the only hope that remains is that the guy is fired before starting to film it.
